interface.name: im.telepathy.SpecAutoGenTest

arg.name: badger
arg.tp:docstring: A badger, which MAY be breezy.

arg.name: mushroom
arg.tp:docstring: Use of hallucinogenic mushrooms will lead to undefined behaviour.

arg.name: misc
arg.tp:docstring: Array of structs containing whatever seems appropriate.

tp:error.name: im.telepathy.SpecAutoGenTest.OtherError
tp:error.tp:docstring: Raised if the badger or the snake eats the mushrooms

tp:property.name: wobbly
tp:property.tp:docstring: Whether or not this badger is wobbly.

property.name: Introspective
property.tp:docstring:
True if the badger is introspective.
Goths can be mistaken for badgers in poor lighting conditions.

tp:enum.name: Adjective
tp:enum.tp:docstring: Adjectives which may be applied to a specification

interface.tp:docstring: A test case for the spec processing.
